Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Fitzroy Motor Inn, you'll be centrally located in Rockhampton, walking distance from Archer Park Station & Steam Train Museum and close to Pilbeam Theatre. This family-friendly motel is within close proximity of Rockhampton Art Gallery and Rockhampton Botanic Gardens and Zoo.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 22 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and minibars. Flat-screen televisions with digital programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include desks and coffee/tea makers, and you can also request cribs/infant beds (surcharge).

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as an outdoor pool, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and babysitting/childcare (surcharge). Additional amenities include tour/ticket assistance and barbecue grills.

Dining
Take advantage of the motel's room service (during limited hours).

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in, express check-out, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Free self parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at noon Check-out time is 10 AM
Take advantage of the motel's room service (during limited hours).
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Fitzroy Motor Inn, you'll be centrally located in Rockhampton, walking distance from Archer Park Station & Steam Train Museum and close to Pilbeam Theatre. This family-friendly motel is within close proximity of Rockhampton Art Gallery and Rockhampton Botanic Gardens and Zoo.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Archer Park Station & Steam Train Museum - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Pilbeam Theatre - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Rockhampton Art Gallery - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Rockhampton Botanic Gardens and Zoo - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Stockland Shopping Centre - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi
Central Queensland University - 6.5 km / 4 mi
Aboriginal Dreamtime Cultural Centre - 7.2 km / 4.5 mi
Mount Archer National Park - 8.6 km / 5.3 mi

The preferred airport for Fitzroy Motor Inn is Rockhampton, QLD (ROK) - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
